short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an servetel integrated browser extension that offers the inbound and outbound call services to zendesk crm users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set your business up for success with an integration that offers everything from detailed performance insights to automated intelligence.

Access all your call records even on the go, automate mundane tasks such as lead generation and manual dialling, create as many email templates as you need and add follow-up activities.

Additionally, keep track of everything that goes in your business with an intuitive interface and detailed performance reports that help you identify trends and patterns.
